TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_lekal, title = lekal, year = 2024, month = November, day = 18, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/lekal} }

S.FORM: lekal lekal tu kisu sakiyami. . palekal palekal kita ci Abuan malalinciw nu niyazu'. Abu . palekalen palekalen tu kiya wawa aebi' sa a mihica! pilekalan limaay ku tuki nu pilekalan nu maku tu sananal. . pilekali pilekali mabelesenaw ku kuku' nu misu! pulekal pulekal tu a mumul tu kita tayza i pisakakawawan. . pulekal tu a mumul tu kita a taumah. . mulekal 1. ,2. pinaay ku tuki nu misu mulekal? limaay ku tuki mulekal kaku. . lalekalan lalekalan nu kawaw. . u lalekalan nu sakacumelak nu niyazu'. . lekala 1. ,2. lekala tu! misakalanam a mumul maluk. . lekala a katukuh tu ku pi de bu wan nu mita! . lekalen lekalen tu i ku uzip muyatayat!
